text: Te, shcho Allah daruvav Svoyemu Poslantsyu vid zhyteliv selyshch, nalezhytʹ Allahu, Poslantsyu ta rodycham yoho, syrotam, bidnym i podorozhnim; i shchob ne distalosya vono bahatiyam z-posered vas!Tozh vizʹmitʹ te, shcho dav vam Poslanetsʹ, ta ne chipayte toho, shcho vin zaboronyv vam. Voistynu, Allah — suvoryy u pokaranni
